item.title: Presentations
item.description: Hand Luggage (AKA an overview of my trips) What’s new in MongoDB 2.6 The What and Why of NoSql The Fine Art of Schema Design in MongoDB: Dos and Don’ts Schema Design - Real world use case MMS - Monitoring, backup and management at a single click MongoDB-TV Elasticsearch 5.0 Elastic{ON} 2017 Recap
